mapper.sql: id, seal_type, seal_material, seal_price, make_department_flag, remarks, update_time,is_delete
mapper.select: select from make_department_seal_price where make_department_flag = #{makeDepartmentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete = false
mapper.update: update make_department_seal_price set is_delete = true where make_department_flag = #{makeDepartmentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into make_department_seal_price (id, seal_type, seal_material, seal_price, make_department_flag, remarks, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDepartmentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
